info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 7:26PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Beaver and northeastern Iron Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 725 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles north of Paragonah, or 15 miles south of Beaver, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beaver and Adamsville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 91 and 109. Utah Route 21 between mile markers 94 and 102. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
